abilities.name: Low Cunning.
abilities.description: The xvart can take the Disengage action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

abilities.name: Overbearing Pack.
abilities.description: The xvart has advantage on Strength (Athletics) checks to shove a creature if at least one of the xvart's allies is within 5 feet of the target and the ally isn't incapacitated.

abilities.name: Raxivort's Tongue.
abilities.description: The xvart can communicate with ordinary bats and rats, as well as giant bats and giant rats.
